channel.title: How people are duping - read before rolling people back
channel.description:
I'm sure this is rather obvious, but we need a way to counter-act it.
Player A (duper) places some blocks they want to dupe (probably diamond) They create a new account, and destroy those blocks, as well as some others so that they get reported for griefing. They put the diamond blocks in a password chest so that they are saved Then then get rolled back, and the blocks they destroyed are there again, but the blocks in the chest are there as well. You now have duped. They get back on Player A account and take the blocks from the chest, and mine the rolled-back blocks again.
I don't see how we can counter act this without checking IPs before rolling back. Any suggestions?

item.title: How people are duping - read before rolling people back
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Oh, good thinking. Didn’t think of that.

Read full topic

item.title: How people are duping - read before rolling people back
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Davidi2:

You can’t get diamond ore or lapiz lazuli ore or redstone ore

That’s right, but you can certainly find a big supply of it in your mine and do the same thing, can you not?

edit:
I want to post these publicly as well, so people know not to build in unprotected areas with diamond blocks or similar.

Read full topic

item.title: How people are duping - read before rolling people back
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, this is what I am excluding, because I don’t think anyone would use them in legitimate building, what do you think:

# gold block, iron block, diamond block, gold ore, iron ore, diamond ore, lapiz lazuli ore, redstone ore, glowing redstone ore, clay block
excluded-blocks: [41, 42, 57, 14, 15, 56, 21, 73, 74, 82]

Read full topic

the ores as well (iron/gold)

item.title: How people are duping - read before rolling people back
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I think residence has pretty much solved that problem, but I still think you should be allowed two areas but you have smaller limits to the amount of land you can protect.

Read full topic
item.source: How people are duping - read before rolling people back

item.title: How people are duping - read before rolling people back
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:18, topic:399153”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=496286.msg3634632#msg3634632 date=1308512586]
LWC doesn’t allow me to specify the ways you can protect chests, or I would remove /cpassword.
[/quote]

What why? That would be terrible. If you’re a person like me who operates with different people all the time and require access to each others chests then this is bad. It would ruin my entire point of playing, as a group of people.[/quote]

Because you can manually specify who you want to have access to a chest, of course this doesn’t matter anymore as chest protection will be removed shortly.

Tom_BETA:

I also want to use those blocks for the finishing touches on complex structures, now I suddenly can’t? I could probably afford to build a monument from iron, and want to in the future.

You can use them, but I’m thinking about making BigBrother not record changes to them, so people can’t duplicate items in this way, would that be a problem anymore now with Residence and such?

Read full topic
item.source: How people are duping - read before rolling people back

What why? That would be terrible. If you’re a person like me who operates with different people all the time and require access to each others chests then this is bad. It would ruin my entire point of playing, as a group of people.

I also want to use those blocks for the finishing touches on complex structures, now I suddenly can’t? I could probably afford to build a monument from iron, and want to in the future.

item.title: How people are duping - read before rolling people back
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:399153”]I don’t know about the other ones, but no one should ever have enough diamonds to actually use diamond blocks to build things, right?[/quote]I can agree with that.

EDIT: I’ve thought of something if you removed the password chest option this wouldn’t be a problem at all and people could use /lwc -c private @playername instead. Also the only people who would really use password chest are people who change accounts a lot e.g ban evaders.

Read full topic
